MessageTypeLoader
public class MessageTypeLoaderAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements MessageTypeLoader

A factory that manufactures a MessageTypeLoader instance.

Gunther Schadow

getInstance

public static MessageTypeLoaderAdapter getInstance()

loadMessageType

public MessageTypeAdapter loadMessageType(java.lang.String id)
                                   throws LoaderException
Loads the message type metadata and returns the reference to the metadata object for the message type. Note that referenced CMETs are not loaded automatically, but only on demand when the corresponding association is actually traversed.

Specified by:
loadMessageType in interface MessageTypeLoader
Parameters:
id - the message type ID
Returns:
the message type metadata
Throws:
LoaderException - if loading fails
